Title: Relates to aggravated unlicensed operation of a motor vehicle which results in a death
Summary: Provides that aggravated unlicensed operation of a motor vehicle, by a person who has a history of reckless driving, which results in a death shall be a class E felony.
LawCode: Amd ยง511, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to aggravated unlicensed operation of a motor vehicle in the first degree
